title: Textile, ca. 1781
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery in colored silks and chenille on satin weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Shaped fragment of white satin embroidered in colored silks and chenille; design, floral sprays enclosed by flowering stems.
